title: Growth, profitability, nutritional, and anti-nutritional properties of seven Manihot esculenta Crantz (cassava) varieties as affected by arbuscular mycorrhizal fungi
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Mbassi Manga Gilbert Ghislain, Djontzo Toche Emmilienne, Essono Damien Mari, Adamou Souleymanou, Fokom Raymond, Nouhou Abassi, Noah Guy, Sonkeng Aurelie, Nwaga Dieudonn√©, Fokou Elie
